item.description:
Hi folks,

In this rehearsal, we will build upon our work last week. We will practice the games in our line up and refine them. Please keep in mind the following:

(1) Don't talk over each other in a scene
(2) Face and project to the audience
(3) Don't play the same character

I will send more detailed show notes in an upcoming email. Please read and review these before our show.

See you soon!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Dress Rehearsal
